discussionPostView.edit:
**Functional Purpose**: Accessibility label for the edit button of a discussion post
**UI Location**: Discussion post header (next to author and timestamp)
**When Users See This**: When viewing a discussion post that the current user has permission to edit
**Technical Context**: Used as the `alt` attribute for an `Icon` component. This text is not visually displayed but read by screen readers.
**Current English**: "Edit"
